name: SA Font Revert
description:
Changes SA font from Open Sans to Arial, and changes size back to 13.

Not working with the most recent changes. Will look at it some time this week.
additional_info:
Update (most recent): Working now, though it changes open sans to arial whereas I used to get verdana (but changing to that has other bad side effects so whatever, Arial it is).

Works for me, though the font on my SA hasn't changed, just the size.
Update: Font has changed for me, should now fix that too, as long as you were getting verdana (the default choice?) before.

discussions.name: This just changes the new shitty font to a different shitty font, not the old non-shitty font.
